I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 6. I can set a timer for you. 
 7. I can get you list of top 10 movies.'
